wikitext.*:
<noinclude>{{month|September}}
Events that occurred on 1 September.
==On Earth==
</noinclude>
* '''[[1917]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] is working on [[The Grey Bridge of Tavrobel]] while in [[Wikipedia:University of Hull#History|Brooklands Officers' Hospital]], [[Wikipedia:Kingston upon Hull|Kingston upon Hull]].
* '''[[1938]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] goes on holiday to recuperate (see [[Letter 33]]).
* '''[[1943]]''' - J.R.R. Tolkien writes [[Letter 49b]].
* '''[[1964]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] met [[Clyde S. Kilby]]. 
* '''[[1971]]''' - Actor [[Dave Wittenberg]] is born.
* '''[[1977]]''' - ''[[Cliffs Notes on Tolkien's The Lord of the Rings and The Hobbit]]'' is published.
* '''[[1989]] - ''[[Oliphaunt (book)|Oliphaunt]]'' is published.'''
* '''[[2009]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Films]]'' is published.
* '''[[2011]]''' - ''[[A Tolkien Tapestry]]'' is published.
* '''[[2011]]''' - ''[[A Critical Companion to J.R.R. Tolkien|A Critical Companion to J.R.R. Tolkien: A Literary Reference to His Life and Works]]'' is published.
* '''[[2011]]''' - ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien (Holiday House)|J.R.R. Tolkien]]'', a children's book from Holiday House, was published.
* '''[[2016]]''' - ''[[Songs of Sorrow and Hope|Songs of Sorrow and Hope: The Art of Jenny Dolfen]]'' is published.
* '''[[2016]]''' - ''[[Tolkien Calendar 2017]]'' is published.
* '''[[2020]]''' - ''[[Tolkien Calendar 2021]]'' is published.
* '''[[2022]]''' - The [[A Shadow of the Past|first]] [[Adrift|two]] episodes of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]'' are  released online.
* '''[[2022]]''' - A new and revised edition of [[The Complete Guide to Middle-earth]] by [[Robert Foster]] is released.
